page.title: 09TUMBLE TYE FARM CAPEL
page.content: Tumble Tye is a mixed dairy and arable farm with two hundred Frisian cows and two hundred calves a year.We visited the farm to watch the cows being milked.Each milking parlour holds 24 cows.First the teats are cleaned then the milking machine is attached. Each cow is milked twice a day.The best cows give 18 litres a day, the milk is kept cool in a huge refrigerated tub until the tanker arrives. In summer the cows graze but in the winter they are fed on silage that has been stored from the summer.Cows usually live for 7 years. Half of the farm's land is under grass,the other half is used for wheat,barley,maize and beans.
